name: Bloog
overview: Released as part of Amiga Classix 3 Classic, game was packaged with a level creator. Created by Marcus 'Mops' Johansson with music by Goran Nilsson using Blitz BASIC, AMOS and Personal Paint, the full version of the game has intro, outro, high-score saving and jumps from 10 levels to 99. Grab the gems, the keys and push the like colors together. The game will get more difficult as you go.
